snippet: The Southern African Development Community said Monday that it would send an envoy and an observer team after military actions over the weekend caused the prime minister to flee.
abstract: Southern African Development Community says that it will send envoy and observer team to Lesotho to help restore stability and security after military actions caused Prime Min Thomas Thabane to flee.
lead_paragraph: The Southern African Development Community said Monday that it would send an envoy and an observer team after military actions over the weekend caused the prime minister to flee.

headline.main: Lesotho: Regional Body Aims to Help Restore Stability
headline.print_headline: Lesotho: Regional Body Aims to Help Restore Stability

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
